Articles.Content: So I've known about KSP for a while now but I only actually bought it on Steam last week. So far, the only things I've put orbit used MechJeb......yeah, I plan to actually fly the rockets someday.....until then Jeb will have to do. Next step: Space Station! See you guys in space!
Welcome aboard! Remember that you can always get some help here if you need it.

Welcome

PS I rewatched Despicable Me on the plane and refered to the minions as Kerbals in my head.
Howdy, Alsaer. Welcome aboard. For the record Kerbals>Minions. Just saying!
